summary:
IMDb, short for Internet Movie Database, is a website with information about movies, TV shows, and more. It started as a fan project in 1990 and became a website in 1993. Amazon's subsidiary, IMDb.com, Inc., now owns it.

The site has details like cast lists, plot summaries, and reviews. As of 2022, it has over 10 million titles and 83 million users. It's one of the most popular websites globally, ranked 52nd by Alexa in 2019.
title: IMDb
